Articles.Content:
Welp... time to crawl out from under this rock of mine and let my self been seen (just a glimps)

Been at this nutty game since version .90 and have gone over 50 mods installed. I figured it was time really get over my head and build a controller of some kind. More on that later.  We be a cunuck and a software engineer.  Anyhoo time to scuttle back under my stone and continue my plotting.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Edited December 26, 2015 by Goshwin

Hello Goshwin, and welcome to the forum!

It's always good to have another lurker come in from the cold.  And, depending which part of Canuckland you're from, it's cold out there!

There are quite a few of us Canuckians here, as well as members from countries around the world.

Happy landings!
Welcome! Have your first rep, courtesy of me!
And I'm sorry that I wasn't here to say hi earlier. That wasn't very neighborly of me, was it? Welcome aboard, and have your second rep, courtesy of me!

Hi, I live not under a rock, but on top of one! Think maybe it's the same rock?

Anyway, happy flying!

On January 1, 2016 at 5:39 PM, cubinator said:

Hi, I live not under a rock, but on top of one! Think maybe it's the same rock?

Anyway, happy flying!

No, I live on top of that one.
Welcome @Goshwin - Hope you're somewhere less snowy than I. OK, there's only about 20 cm, but it's bloody cold.

6 minutes ago, CliftonM said:

No, I live on top of that one.

Oh, cool. I guess I still don't know what rock it is. It's at some kind of Lagrange point right in between two suns so it's never dark enough to guess my position from the stars, so I have to rely on checking which rocks other people don't live on.

11 hours ago, cubinator said:

Oh, cool. I guess I still don't know what rock it is. It's at some kind of Lagrange point right in between two suns so it's never dark enough to guess my position from the stars, so I have to rely on checking which rocks other people don't live on.

You must be on a slow orbit.  Wait a couple hundred years, and you'll be able to navigate.
